channel.title: Feli on Felix
channel.description: Recent content in Feli on Felix

item.title: Presidential candidates boycott radio debate after “aggressive” emails and “extreme dissatisfaction"
item.author: Felix Editor,Grace G Rahman,,
item.description: A debate between Union President Candidates that was due to be held on IC Radio last night was scuppered after four candidates decided to boycott the show an hour before it went on air. The show, which initially raised eyebrows after one presenter had been on one candidate’s campaign team, was later …

item.title: Imperial professor makes questionable comments on race in new book
item.author: Felix Editor,Grace G Rahman,,
item.description: One of Imperial’s Emeritus professors has published a book on human diversity, in which he claims that London has “‘no-go’ areas at night for white people”. He also wrote that having “one race” would “help a nation minimise internal and external conflicts”. Both comments are uncited, and appear in …
